title: Star Wars
description: A popular sci-fi franchise set in a galaxy far, far away. Includes movies, TV series, books, and merchandise.

title: Avengers
description: A superhero team from Marvel Comics, consisting of iconic characters like Iron Man, Captain America, Thor, Hulk, Black Widow, and Hawkeye. They protect the world from threats.

title: DC
description: DC Comics is a publisher known for iconic superheroes like Superman, Batman, Wonder Woman, and the Flash. The DC Universe features a wide range of characters, villains, and epic storylines.

title: Transformers
description: A franchise featuring sentient robots that can transform into vehicles, weapons, or animals. Transformers are divided into Autobots and Decepticons, and their battles often take place on Earth.
